item.title: Enabling spell check in Mindtouch Core
item.description: After an update the spell checker I was used to disappeared. Here’s how to (re)enable the (new) spell checker: Go to Control Panel -> Configuration -> Basic -> Tick “Allow users to spell check while editing content” and hit Save Go back to editing and you should see the icon with “ABC” and a checkmark.
